content: If L is the coend of F, a morphism L->x is described by maps F(y,y)->x dinatural in y. This is nice. But if I have a sequence L->L->x, for a morphism L->L described by another dinatural transformation, is there any explicit description for the composite? Or even in the case where we have z->L->x, with the 2nd morphism described by a known dinatural transformation.
